outputs.output_descr: This project aims at enhancing the institutional capacity of the parliament leading and corresponding to sustainable social, economic and human development priorities in Syria. The project will apply an integrative approach leveraging information technology, policy research, optimizing the traditional library, activating the e-library and developing the capacity of the secretariat staff, elected members and standing committees. The project will also foster dialogue and communication between the Parliament and Syrian citizens, voters and local community groups through an improved Help Desk system.
